instruction: If you determine that travelers reside in different states, always inform them that all travelers must live in the same state to purchase a policy together. Advise them that if they live in different states, they must purchase separate policies, even if their question was about a different topic.

expected_answer: Thanks for reaching out! Since some travelers live in different states, you wonâ€™t be able to purchase a single policy together. All travelers must reside in the same state to be on one policy. Because your daughter lives in Texas while you and your wife live in California, youâ€™ll need to purchase separate policies for each state. Iâ€™m happy to help guide you through each one.
agent_answer: Hi Bobby! Thanks for reaching out. Just a quick note: all travelers must live in the same state to purchase a policy together. Since your daughter Rudy is flying from Texas, it looks like you'll need to purchase separate policies for your trip.
